column2: Spok Holdings, Inc. engages in the provision of communication solutions. The company is headquartered in Springfield, Virginia and currently employs 617 full-time employees. The firm is engaged in the healthcare communications. The firm is a provider of paging services and selected software solutions in the United States and abroad, on a limited basis, in Europe, Canada, Australia, Asia and the Middle East. The firm offers its services and products primarily to three market segments: healthcare, government and large enterprise. The firm offers subscriptions to one-way or two-way messaging services for a periodic (monthly, quarterly, semi-annual or annual) service fee. A subscriber to one-way messaging services selects coverage on a local, regional or nationwide basis as per their messaging needs. Two-way messaging is offered on a nationwide basis. The firm's critical communication solutions are grouped under four product categories: Contact Center, Clinical Alerting, Mobile Communications and Public Safety.
